document.docAuthor: Nartshuk, Emilia P. & Tschirnhaus, Michael Von
document.masterDocTitle: New generic synomyms in the Chloropidae (Diptera, Acalyptratae), with additional taxonomic notes

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New generic synomyms in the Chloropidae (Diptera, Acalyptratae), with additional taxonomic notes

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Chlorops brevipennis
Meigen, 1830
: 159
— Germany . Designation: original.

Type species:
Myrmemorpha brachyptera
Dufour, 1833
: 219
— Spain . Designation: monotypy. Senior name but not available after article 23 of the Code, see above.

Type species:
Oscinis cornuta
Fallén, 1820
: 6
— Sweden . Designation:
Corti, 1909
: 12 .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pachychaeta
Loew, 1845
: 50
—proposed in synonymy with
Crassiseta
von Roser. Type species
Oscinis cornuta
Fallén, 1820
: 6
— Sweden . Designation:
Andersson 1977
: 68
, incorrectly stated as monotypy.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Oscinis cornuta

: 6
— Sweden . Designation: original.

Type species:
Hippelates eulophus
Loew, 1872
: 104
— USA . Designation: original.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Myrmecomorpha
Corti, 1909
: 141
—subsequent usage of the unjustified emendation of
Myrmemorpha
. Type species:
Chlorops brevipennis
Meigen, 1830
: 159
- Germany . Designation: monotypy.

Doliomyia
Johannsen, 1924
: 89
; as subgenus of
Melanochaeta
.

subSubSection.paragraph:

: 89
— USA . Designation: original.

: 360
— Kenya . Designation: original.

Melanochaeta
authors nec Bezzi, in part.
